profile.name: Matt Millar
profile.headline: Technical Business Analyst | Data & Insights
profile.summary: Delivery-centric Technical BA who pairs discovery and delivery chops with prompt-engineering workflows across Claude Opus, GPT-5, OpenAI Codex, DeepSeek, and local Llama models to compress analysis and build cycles. Keeps stakeholders looped in with plain-English updates while turning requirements into time-saving automation and decision-ready outputs.

titles.items: Technical Documentation, WordPress Consultant, Training/Workshops, Video Editor

bullets.bullet: Turned high-level asks into concise specifications, SOPs, and how-to guides that reduced rework and accelerated delivery for small business and internal stakeholders.

Codified reusable LLM prompt libraries and lightweight automation scripts with Claude Opus, GPT-5, DeepSeek, and local Llama models to fast-track keyword extraction, qualitative coding, and prototype Python/JS helpers so clients could turn deliverables around faster.

Designed and led in-person and online workshops on generative AI opportunities, risks, and guardrails using Miro and Google Slides; improved understanding and practical adoption across mixed audiences.
Produced music video content and visual assets using Kdenlive; planned storyboards and executed edits to brief, ensuring clear narrative flow and on-brand delivery.
Built and maintained WordPress sites including theme setup, UX/content structure, SEO basics, and CMS blog formatting to improve clarity and discoverability.

achievements.achievement: Created a visually engaging GenAI training series with practical exercises and take-home guides; boosted confidence and safe adoption among non-technical staff.

skills_and_competencies.items: Stakeholder interviews, Workshops & facilitation, Requirements & user stories, Process mapping / SOPs, Plain-language communications, UAT support, Presentation storytelling, Content design

tools_and_tech.items: Claude Opus, GPT-5, OpenAI Codex, DeepSeek, Llama (local), Miro, Google Slides, WordPress, Google Workspace, Kdenlive

titles.items: Technical Business Analyst, Product Owner, Scrum Master, QA

bullets.bullet: Converted proposals into detailed specifications with user stories, acceptance criteria, and assumptions; aligned business and engineering through workshops and WIPs.
Maintained delivery hygiene in Jira/Confluence, supported UAT and test planning, and produced decision-ready updates and decks for non-technical stakeholders.

Automated competitor analysis by chaining keyword clustering and summarisation prompts across Claude Opus, GPT-5, and OpenAI Codex, shrinking a three-day review cycle into a four-hour insight pack and freeing time for deeper recommendations.
Facilitated an ATS transition by defining a single source of truth, aligning ownership, and mapping handoffs to reduce ambiguity and improve reporting.
Mapped an end-to-end hiring flow in Miro across teams and systems; clarified roles, approvals, and SLAs to decrease rework and speed up onboarding decisions.

achievements.achievement: Turned ClearPoint's competitor-analysis workflow from a three-day manual trawl into a four-hour AI-assisted cycle, enabling same-week synthesis and recommendations.

skills_and_competencies.items: Stakeholder facilitation, Requirements engineering, Backlog management, Delivery cadence (Scrum), UAT/test support, Documentation (Confluence), Change communications

bullets.bullet: Led pick/pack/dispatch operations and vehicle loading for daily deliveries; coordinated sequencing so installers and drivers left on time with complete orders.
Tracked inventory movement and levels; produced weekly reports directly for the CFO with clear summaries, exceptions, and actions.
Built product compatibility databases and substitution rules (COGS per m², volume/floorspace/truckspace constraints) to keep jobs moving during shortages.
Designed and implemented a bespoke WMS/FMS in AppSheet + Google Sheets with barcode/QR scanning and real-time dashboards; replaced paper processes and standardised capture.
Created timestamped bay–SKU dashboards (Looker Studio/Sheets) to plan picks/putaway against the week’s jobs and optimise space and time on the floor.
Liaised with suppliers and 3PL partners through the 2021 Auckland COVID lockdowns and Suez Canal disruption; balanced established processes with change management to reduce stockouts and bottlenecks.
Trained drivers and staff on mobile vehicle logs and incident reporting; delivered handover to the CFO on data schemas and how to migrate toward a future COTS ERP/WMS/FMS.
Encouraged a blameless safety culture; led toolbox talks for pedestrians in forklift zones and ran post-incident reviews to improve reporting and prevention.

achievements.achievement: Reduced weekly reporting workload from nearly two full days (with overtime) to a single afternoon via automation and standardised data capture.
No-code WMS/FMS with barcode/QR scanning and real-time dashboards → 80%+ reduction in time and errors across reporting and picking workflows.
Maintained delivery continuity through 2021 disruptions with substitution logic and forward planning, minimising backorders and wasted truckspace.

skills_and_competencies.items: Inventory management, Pick/pack/dispatch, Process mapping / SOPs, Reporting & insight, Supplier & 3PL coordination, Change management, Health & Safety culture, Stakeholder communication, Training & onboarding

tools_and_tech.items: AppSheet, Google Sheets, Apps Script, Looker Studio (Google Data Studio), Power BI, Google Forms, Google Sites, Label/QR tools, Barcode scanners, Mobile devices, Teletrac Navman

ai_prompt_engineering.items: Prompt design & testing, Claude Opus, GPT-5, OpenAI Codex, DeepSeek, Llama (local), Prompt libraries & guardrails, Keyword extraction & qualitative coding automations

analytics_bi.items: Excel (PivotTables, XLOOKUP), Power BI (Power Query, DAX – developing), Looker Studio

business_analysis_delivery.items: Stakeholder interviews, Workshops & facilitation, Requirements & user stories, Process mapping / SOPs, UAT/test support, Plain-language communications, Delivery cadence (Scrum), Change communications

platforms_domains.items: Jira, Confluence, HubSpot CRM, WMS/Inventory systems, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365

presentation_enablement.items: PowerPoint (storytelling; strong), Miro (workshops), Google Slides, Kdenlive

industry_snapshot.items: Technology/Software, Logistics/Supply Chain, Operations, Professional Services/Consulting
